name: Danang Evening Food Experience
description:
Da
Nang is not just a city of lights and beautiful beaches but also a
great food city. The best way to discover this city is to stay away
from the luxurious restaurants. Instead, go to explore the alleys
where the stunning street foods constantly attract the local nightly.
Go for the wind along the nicest streets in Da Nang to see and feel
the peaceful but fantastic pace of life in Da Nang city. Let’s take
a step into the heart of the city and find that the real pleasures
lie in its burgeoning street food scene.
